definitions.body: :Ez Eze 46:21 place of corner-structure, (inner) corner-buttress (as (place of) cutting off of an inner angle if √ rightly expl.; v. definitions.title: Pu.
definitions.body: Pt. fr. [[קָחַע]] Thes Buhl:Lex 13 al.), but rd. prob. [[מִקְחׂעׂת]], so SS Baen; sf. [[מִקְחׂעוֹתָיו]] Ez Eze 41:22; -corner-post of altar Ez Eze 41:22, tabern. Ex 26:23, Ex 26:24 = Ex 36:28, Ex 36:29; (inner) buttress-place of court, where the small corner-courts were, Ez Eze 46:21, Eze 46:21, Eze 46:21, Eze 46:22; of inner (rock- ?) buttress at NE. corner of wall of Jerus., ´[[הַמּ]]:, nearly = n.pr., Ne 3:19, Ne 3:20, Ne 3:25, also (disting. fr. [[פִּנׇּה]]) v:Ne 3:24, 2Ch 26:9.
